content: अंबूकृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Sputtered, pronounced indistinctly in shutting the lips, the sound thus remaining as it were in the mouth; uttered while emitting saliva from the mouth. --तं A sputtering noise, the growling of a bear; दधति कुहरभाजामत्र भल्लूकयूनामनुरसितगुरूणि स्त्यानमंबूकृतानि <ls>U. 2. 21</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 6</ls>; <ls>Mv. 5. 41.</ls>
